lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have struggled to get my business up and running. Sometime it is very dificult to raise the money required to break through to the next level.
lender.occupational_info: I offer help, advice and marketing tools to people who use the Internet to market their businesses

lender.name: Moy
lender.loan_because: 1) Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it. and 2) You must be the change you want to see in this world. --Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: Development

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I possess the means to help someone do something they cannot do for themselves.

lender.name: Soli
lender.loan_because: I haven't made a loan yet because I don't have any extra money .....but I bought a gift cerfificate.- I smile inside when I give, my heart and mind are happy...
lender.occupational_info: I have 23 students in my class. I have wonderful friends that I work with. I make the best out of each day. I work hard and dedicate a lot of time to my job and family..I have to balance my time.-between work and play...to keep my sanity. Humor helps me through it all.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: There are people who have less than i do who can make a difference in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I design specialized lighting and sound for theatrical productions around the United States.

lender.name: marie
lender.loan_because: i want to start a business..

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I feel this is one of the best ways to end the poverty cycle in the life of an individual.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a youth director and full time graduate student studying school counseling.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: Because I care.

lender.name: Chelsea & Matt
lender.loan_because: We feel that our contributions can end up making a larger impact down the road.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupation: Customer Service, The Body Shop Australia
lender.loan_because: It keeps me grounded. There is always someone out there worse off than you.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I met a wonderful gentleman at my work, whom has helped me very much and many others. He encouraged me to loan in memory of his friend Dick Sadler, Who gave away his life earnings when he passed to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a waitress at a Methodist retreat. I am also attending school. I have a degree in Horticulture. I am currently trying to get accepted to a nursing program..

lender.name: Tom & Shireen
lender.occupational_info: Furniture Manufacturing

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. -- Margaret Mead

lender.name: Celes
lender.loan_because: I support social entrepreneurship and would like to see impoverished people have a hand up. I like to support innovation.
lender.occupational_info: I help small rural communities and tourism businesses to see the potential of their own nature and landscape, cuisine, artists, culture and traditions as potential experiences that can be carefully crafted for travellers. By doing so, these communities learn to collaborate, increase their wealth, and use the Internet as a means of levelling the playing field to be able to tell their own stories. Inspire, innovate, celebrate!

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a healthy, happy family and wish to see the less fortunate have the benefit of seeing their families grow up healthy and happy as well.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I know that people can achieve their dreams. I am primarily interested in lending to entrepreneurs whose business is music. I am also interested in community empowerment centered around education, physical fitness, healthy eating, small-scale, sustainable agriculture, and the full participation of women in societies.
lender.occupational_info: I primarily assist others in academic development and maturation.

lender.name: Janaya
lender.loan_because: I am able to give, so therefore I should.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work, but currently attend college full time.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs and want to help them realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office assistant to officials in a government agency. Our agency supports and serves the needs of thousands of citizens in multiple large cities.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I can. More people should loan.

lender.name: Nerine
lender.loan_because: I feel that if wealth can be shared the world is a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health industry and as a project officer I contribute to creating better environments for hospital staff and patients.

lender.name: Ruud
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: A nerd in computer-stuff.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's a sustainable way to help people better their lives.

lender.name: Ruth and Paul
lender.loan_because: we love the idea that our money can be used so significantly to assist somebody in succeeding.
lender.occupational_info: Computer support to other small businesses.

lender.name: Jussi
lender.loan_because: Providing opportunities to others makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Basic office work: e-mails, meetings, phone calls, missed dead lines, etc.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: kiva allows me to help others in increments I am able to afford.
lender.occupational_info: I study architecture, the art and science of sheltering humanity.

lender.name: Yavuz
lender.loan_because: Direct to needy-least intermediates.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. People value things more when it comes by their own efforts and they can be proud of their achievements. Charity often makes the giver feel good, but not necessarily the receiver.
lender.occupational_info: I support 7 fee earners (lawyers). I do all of their typing, archiving, opening and closing matters, keep their personal law library up to date, filing and prepare and send out their bills. I also make their tea or coffee, clean up their office, send invites to events and make up client lists for marketing. My job is often boring, sometimes frantic, but safe indoors with no heavy lifting.

lender.name: Markus
lender.occupational_info: Securing the world wide web, one application at a time

lender.name: Peter and Eddie
lender.loan_because: we were given a loan as a Christmas gift, what a great idea! It is great to be helping people who need the help to help themselves.

lender.name: Per og Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: Tone har fortalt meg om det :-)

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Es ist eine super Idee!
lender.occupational_info: Webdesign & SEO

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves and could use a some support.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: The idea behind Kiva makes it one of the best pages in the world wide web - actually it IS what makes the web truly WORLD WIDE. Get connected with other people! Make a change to someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help people from behind a desk. It sometimes works :o)

lender.name: Jimmi Jonsson
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of micro credits.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: To help others make a difference in their lives

lender.name: ystein
lender.loan_because: To care for each other is to be human. Making happiness for others is creating happiness for ourself

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: It seems that insignificant sums to me may mean a bit more to others, especially when working with a community that feels the same way.
lender.occupational_info: Computers have always been a fascination of mine, and I've always been good with them. In my current line of work, I'm able to help other people with computer issues while learning more about a subject I'm quite interested in. It's a great fit!

lender.name: achmed osoma binboom
lender.occupation: terrorist..... uh i mean NOT a terrorist
lender.loan_because: I loan because I support the downfall of the US. I like to make bombs and support others who make bombs as well.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I blow things up. I did a suicide bombing once, but it didn't work so well, as you can see. I also hail Alah in my spare time.

lender.name: DIDIT
lender.loan_because: regards, I borrowed money for online business, invest and develop more of my money
lender.occupational_info: I work at home, I am every day looking for a profitable online business via the Internet

lender.name: perou-voyage.com
lender.occupational_info: Nour sommes une agence de voyages peruvienne qui propose des circuits touristiques vers tout le Prou.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I believe Capitalism, in its most basic form, works quite well.

lender.name: Ninu
lender.loan_because: I am blessed
lender.occupational_info: Concerned about life in the developing world

lender.name: USE
lender.loan_because: On the occasion of our anniversary (5th) USE wishes to connect with entrepreneurs in third world countries who could use some support.

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jan-Ole
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people reach their financial independence.

lender.name: Jani
lender.loan_because: Try to help people to make a living.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: Most people will do the best they can to achieve a decent life if only they have the chance. These loans give them that chance.
lender.occupational_info: Now that I no longer work, I sing, mostly jazz, some gospel, some classical. I sing for joy, and for the love of music.

lender.name: anissa
lender.loan_because: If I can help in some small way and impact a positive change in another's life, the gift is really to myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work 24 hours a day, 7 days a week as a mother. It truly is the hardest job on earth.. but it has the highest reward.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their desire to work hard to make a living. Sometimes it just takes a little help to get going.
lender.occupational_info: I work inside an airplane three days a week. I take care of our customers, serving them drinks and snacks but am trained to help them in case of a medical emergency or airplane accident.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: In the summer of 2010, I will be traveling to Uganda on the Invisible Children's TEACHERS EXCHANGE PROGRAM to teach Environmental Science and Sustainability Design at Keyo Secondary School for a year. I am raising money for my program fee, traveling expenses, school supplies, photo copies, text books, drawing supplies and high school lab equipment for my future students.

lender.name: Arcturus Solutions Team
lender.loan_because: To encourage hard working entrepreneurs around the world, on behalf of our friends and colleagues.

lender.name: Julienne
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all help our fellow men. Someday my husband and I hope to have a little wine bar restaurant and although its not something we can afford here right now, I feel very glad to help others with the same goals.. feeding people is a very worthy pursuit.
lender.occupational_info: I work back stage on Broadway. At the moment its American Idiot the Green Day musical. I work with the Costumes and the actors. We make the "magic happen", the "how did they do that" factor. The wardrobe department make years pass in 20 seconds by changing costumes that quickly. In my show there are about 15 costume changes per actor in a 90 minute show. We work 8 shows a week and 6 days a week. We tend to work when other people are off but we get paid to help make other peoples art.. and that's a pretty good job I guess.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
Access to credit is an important component of economic and social development.
All people should have the opportunity to create better lives for themselves, for their families, and for their communities.
"Why I want to be a Kiva Fellow" : http://johnfmurphy.wordpress.com/
lender.occupational_info:
I work with EDESA, one of Kiva's Costa Rican field partners. EDESA extends affordable credit to over 130 Empresas de Crdito Comunal (ECCs - Communal Credit Companies in English) who then lend to the entrepreneurs featured on Kiva's website.
Check out my Kiva Fellows blog for up-to-date information on the awesome things happening at EDESA and how they tie back to lenders like you.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: Jesus has given me the greatest gift of all and I want to share that love in as many ways as I can.

lender.name: Marleigh Anik Chelsey
lender.loan_because: It is our destiny and we need to help one person at a time to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are very hard working students, some hoping to go into a career of business and others just want to succeed in life.

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: I like to help people follow their dreams. It can take just one other person to believe in you, for you to succeed.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Love is a Verb...
lender.occupational_info: I manage government construction projects related to infastructure in the San Diego area...

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: giving someone a hand-up is empowering
lender.occupational_info: development and sales of green energy technology

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: teaching to catch fish is better than giving a fish

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe all people should have access to the basics of life, such as food, water, education, and opportunity. I just want to help and connect to people.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit and help students get accepted to a prestigious arts boarding-school.

lender.name: Pierrette
lender.loan_because: I beleive in empowering people, by giving them the tools they need. Kiva project is dear to my daughter, who is studyingin International Development; this loan is a birthday gift for her...HAPPY BIRTHDAY ZO
lender.occupational_info: I work in adult literacy.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to support local development in any way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: teaching / research / service

lender.name: ren
lender.loan_because: I didn't have a lot, so I can give
lender.occupational_info: just an artist on the way to work life

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a dent in the world poverty problem.
lender.occupational_info: I work for AT&T in the USA.

lender.name: Mr Yedid
lender.loan_because: economic opportunity, and alleviating poverty, is the surest way to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7th and 8th grade.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: Throughout his 23 year commercial real estate career in Southwest Florida, Jim has been fortunate to represent and work with a number of local, regional, national and international Medical and Office tenants/owners. Tampa Medical Office Specialist.

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: I love children
lender.occupational_info: I am in Ghana to help the poor street kids, they need your helps. I was born in Ahus Sweden.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: to share in promoting the most effective form of economic aid is easy and worthwhile thanks to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get and keep businesses going.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Want to help build something productive that adds value to people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help scientists at Universities in my state (Kentucky) get money to do their research.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Aiming to lend only to 'exponential impact' initiatives that socially, psychologically or physically benefit communities and families larger than N=1. Preference for health-related, research-related and internet-related initiatives. (Just started with providing loans)

lender.name: seth
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: hardwork

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping women around the world with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Chief Financial Officer for a lighting manufacturing company.

lender.name: Per
lender.loan_because: I hope it does good.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a beautiful family and have the resources to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager responsible for computer technology.

lender.name: Natascia
lender.loan_because: It helps us all!
lender.occupational_info: Researchers are today's explorers :-)

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: I manage a coffee shop

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I am able to help because others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Helping my company make sure it doesn't pollute our local air and water.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: We can build relationships and peace by helping instead of fighting.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the money and all other fiscal aspects of a public high school.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: what a gift to be able to impower people....
lender.occupational_info: fun and differnt everyday......

lender.name: Viji
lender.loan_because: Want to contribute to this world...one little step at a time could possibly make a huge difference someday...

lender.name: Jennifer Keliher-Venegas
lender.loan_because: I believe this organization has tremendous potential to address global poverty and alleviate the needs of people like just me that only need the willing support of a few to rise up to new personal and economic heights. One small spark can indeed set a whole forest ablaze, be the one to start a fire...
lender.occupational_info: Student who studies marine life and loves Jesus

lender.name: HARRY
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do for people.

lender.name: James Ward
lender.loan_because: when I travel (as I did recently to Cambodia) I like to talk to local people and discover what life is like for them. We are so wealthy in the developed world I want to offer people in less fortunate countries to help build their own business and support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I seek to experience, explore, and understand

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: retired legal assistant; adult literacy volunteer

lender.name: Chris Jones
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people change their lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses designing, building and developing websites.

lender.name: jumana
lender.loan_because: I can and want to do same as someone else did for my family

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Helping those who want to help themselves feels very, very good...it makes me a better human being.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I can and I love the idea of small loans to change peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I care for children while the parents are at work.

lender.name: Don & Vicki
lender.loan_because: "The value of a man resides in what he gives and not what he is capable of receiving!"
lender.occupational_info: We look for opportunites around the world to invest and build relationships. We are blessed with so many great opportunities here at home in Canada but enjoy travelling the world.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can. I beleive that the universe helps us when we need it and in turn it is our duty as fellow humans to help each other when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I assist seniors in their homes. I help them with everything from bathing and toileting to shopping and companionship.

lender.name: MBC Youth
lender.loan_because: "So that the poor have hope and injustice shuts its mouth..." Job :16
lender.occupational_info: We are the youth group of Maitland Baptist Church in New South Wales, Australia. We are high school students aged 12-18, plus leaders. We meet every Friday. We want to give something to help others who don't have what we have, because God has blessed us with so much.
